itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Coal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Keplan Quarry, Glutoni Cave, Omar Lava Cave. It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Coal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Keplan Quarry, Glutoni Cave, Omar Lava Cave. It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe.

item.name: Sturdy Fluid Collector
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting animal blood or sap.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Pickaxe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Fluid Collector
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting animal blood or sap.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Shoes with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas shoes, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Shoes

item.name: Combat Steel Champron
item.desc: Horse helmet made of steel. Very durable but it is heavy.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Mediah Fishing Rod
item.desc: Ash tree float. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Calpheon Fishing Rod
item.desc: Calpheon fishing rod. ...And it was super effective!\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Epheria Fishing Rod
item.desc: Epheria fishing rod. It is sturdier than other rods.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Steel Ingot Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 Steel Ingots.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Staff
item.desc:
A Seleth staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Seleth staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.name: Steel Battle Horseshoe
item.desc: Durable heavy horseshoe made of steel that is purpose built for battle\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Noble Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Combat Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Durable heavy stirrup made of hard leather that is purpose built for battle.
Makes you able to attack while riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Hide Stirrups
item.desc:
Sturdier and lighter stirrup made of high-quality leather
Makes you able to attack while riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Combat Steel Barding
item.desc: Specially made steel horse helmet that can be used in battle. It is very heavy.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Gloves
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Gloves with maximum potential
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas gloves, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Gloves

item.desc:

item.desc: Balenos fishing rod. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Golden Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +3 Levels

item.name: Steel Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +2 Levels
